name: AUSD
description: AUSD, a digital dollar minted 1:1 with USD fiat. AUSD is designed to be a secure digital currency, utilizing one of the worldâ€™s largest custodian banks to safeguard assets, a big 4 auditor and a top tier fund manager. AUSD enables users to participate in trading, lending and payments. It is the most cost-efficient stablecoin to transact with due to its gas-optimized smart contract, making it ideal for traders and payments.
